article_title: New York Will Allow Extra Test Time
article_text:
New York students in grades three through eight will get extra time on state tests this spring if they need it.

State education commissioner MaryEllen Elia on Wednesday said she understood part of the stress about testing came from strict time limits, especially among younger children.

“If they are working productively, they will be able to continue the assessment in a setting where they can read, comprehend and respond to...
